duties_responsibilities.duty: Develop and create predictive models, behavioral segmentation frameworks, profitability analyses, ad hoc reporting, and data visualizations.
Lead complex initiatives and projects to derive insights from extracted data to solve critical business questions.
Translate client/stakeholder needs into technical analyses and/or solutions in collaboration with internal and external partners.
Identify rich data sources and monitor the melding and cleaning of datasets to ensure consistency.
Deliver high-quality project solutions and tools within agreed-upon timelines and budget parameters and conduct post-implementation reviews.
Guide others to develop sophisticated multivariate models and analytic solutions utilizing complex statistical and data science techniques and methods.

education_certification.credential: Bachelor's degree in Data Science, Computer Science, Statistics, or related field (Master's preferred)
